Environment: tractors were seized and confiscated by specialists in Kampong Tralach Forestry
Administration at 10:20 am on the morning of January 16
FEATURED: 2019.------The tractors were clearing forest on protected state land in Samaki Meanchey.------When spotted by the Forestry patrol the tractor drivers fled. The police were then called and the machines were taken away. ------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/769868.html
